attributes.action: Stop our Local Government, Brent Council, from forcing property owners to replace their roofs on Dyne Rd (NW2).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brent Council are sending out demands for properties on Dyne Road (NW2) and adjoining roads in the Conservation area,forcing landlords to remove their existing roofs. The roofs that are being targeted appear to be very similar to the 'acceptable' roofs. I invite you to join our petition.
